task.title: Installing Browser Setup Script and Logging in
task.shortdesc: Acme Eye is a proposal automation tool that enables you to save time and increase sales. To use Acme Eye, you must install the browser setup script.

taskbody.prereq: For Acme Eye, you will need a desktop computer or mobile device, Microsoft Word, and a web browser. For additional information on reviewing prerequisites, see .
taskbody.context:
Before logging in to Acme Eye for the first time, you need to install Acme Eye Browser Setup Script.
To install Acme Eye Browser Setup Script, follow these tasks.

step.cmd: Download Acme Eye Browser Setup Script from the Acme webpage:Acme.
Close all applications, including Outlook, and web browsers before installing Acme Eye Browser Setup Script.
Double-click on Acme Eye Browser Setup Script executable file (.exe) to run the script.
Log in to Acme Eye with your single sign-on credentials from the Acme Eye link: Acme Eye

taskbody.result: When you log in to Acme Eye, the Welcome Screen is displayed.
taskbody.postreq: Go on to the next task: .
